TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UpdateRowSource extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how query command results are applied to the row being updated.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The UpdateRowSource values are used by the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> and any classes derived from it.
For more information property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateRowSource Both = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Both the output parameters and the first returned row are mapped to the changed row in the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateRowSource FirstReturnedRecord = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The data in the first returned row is mapped to the changed row in the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateRowSource None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Any returned parameters or rows are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateRowSource OutputParameters = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Output parameters are mapped to the changed row in the .
